tracks.text: Funimation
Our view lifts to a narrow, dark alleyway
We move forward, shakily
We turn left, and approach a door covered in taped papers.
We cast a shadow against the door.
We look at the doorknob, and our hand reaches out.
Cut to black
Our eyes open to the corrugated metal and boxes of a warehouse.
A blond teenage boy gets up from a mattress on the floor. He wears jeans and a green coat. Trash is shoved under a table. Through the windows, we see an overcast, gray day.
Rocks, moss and roots litter the muddy ground.
The boy trudges through a forest. He approaches a road.
He begins walking down the road, over a hill.
Through a break in the trees, we can see a city down in the valley.
He wears an eyepatch
Pochita is an orange dog with a chainsaw blade, handle, and tail.

The teenager pulls Pochita's tail, revving the chainsaw. He looks behind rubble at a devil. It resembles a car-sized tomato, with 8 human legs and dozens of eyes. Suddenly, all eyes focus on us. The devil turns, and opens its vertical mouth, running the height of its body.
Intro credits. The teenager pulls a chainsaw string.
4 people walk across a street: the blond teenager, a pink haired woman, a black haired man, and a girl with horns.
A girl with horns makes a face. The blond boy makes a face.
As a child, the blond boy hugs Pochita in a graveyard. A scruffy blond man brandishes a gun.
People jump in a well. A person with a mask removes his shoes. People drive a car. 4 people move around a cramped office.
The blond boy covers his mouth. An angel with a halo sits on stairs. 2 people talk closely at night. The teenager and several people sit in a movie theater.
A small woman gets up and walks away. The horned girl takes the woman's spot. The woman argues with the horned girl. Another woman feeds popcorn to the teenager.
The teenager holds a bowling ball, while a black haired man throws one.
The bowling ball explodes pins. The horned girl poses in a red and white bathing suit above the word Power.
Behind her, someone leads the teenager on his hands and knees by a leash.
A giant snake monster flies through the sky. Bands of ammunition falls.
The teenager lies on a bench, and rests his head on the lap of a pink haired woman.

As she rubs his head, plants grow around the frame. Venus fly traps. The woman stands in a forest as hands approach her. She turns, and then hands splash into water. The teenager wakes up, covered in fly traps and mushrooms.
Blood runs down his nose as a chainsaw grows from his forehead.
The pink haired woman makes a rectangle with her fingers and looks through it.
She places a glowing slug in the teenager's mouth. She smiles against a backdrop of blood spatter.
A teenager jumps from a window. He has chainsaws for arms, legs, and a head. He slides down several floors of the building, while he drives the chainsaw into the external walls.
He jumps, and lands on a pink, bulbous devil with root legs and chain arms.
The horned girl and black haired man watch as chains grab the chainsaw teenager. He is tossed through the air, smacking into buildings.
The chainsaw man's tears through flesh and blood and screams.

On the ground, he looks at the the pink devil. The horned girl uses a mallet twice her size to hit an even larger bronze ball. Chainsaw man rides the makeshift bowling ball towards the devil and jumps.
In a kitchen, the teenager breaks an egg and looks at his messy hand. A paper covered door in an alley way. The horned girl walks away from an explosion.
The black haired man stands on a pile of books. The young teenager cuddles with Pochita.
A devil made of thorns dances in a pool.

A giant devil eats a street light. Another devil dances among swinging axes. The teenager and horned girl dance on a street while the black haired man smokes. He turns to us and makes a fox face with his hands. Cut to black. Chainsaw Man.
The teenager removes a chainsaw blade from red flesh. He stands on top of the devil in front of a traditional Japanese house. A gray haired man watches.
Denji passes a man smoking in a car. The white haired man sits in the back.
As Denji walks down the sidewalk, a car pulls up beside him.
He puts the lit cigarette in his mouth
The driver tosses a coin, and Denji catches it. The yakuza car pulls away.
Denji watches them go. His smile drops to a frown, and he takes the cigarette out of his mouth. He squats and pets Pochita.
After Pochita, Denji takes a bite.
Sun shines between the rain clouds.
Young Denji stands in the rain, looking at a gravestone, standing next to a car.
The car drives off. Denji stands in a field, alone with a grave marker and a tree.
Denji looks around. Pochita appears behind the tree.
Pochita likes on his side. Blood drips from 2 holes in his stomach.
Denji remembers his father, hanging from a rope.
Pochita gets up
He bites Denji's forearm. Blood drips from the room.
In an alley, Denji presents the yakuza with a small, bloody demon he's split in half. He holds Pochita.
In present day, Denji curls into Pochita in the moonlight.
Denji coughs blood into his hand.
Denji and Pochita look at each other.
At night, a car drives through the city.
The car drives down a winding road through the woods.
The car turns into a lot surrounded with a rusted metal wall.
It pulls up to a crumbling warehouse missing half a roof.
Clouds pass in front of the full moon.
The white haired yakuza walks ahead of Denji
The yakuza stops.
Denji stumbles forward. He looks back. The smoking yakuza, disheveled and bloody, has thrust a sword through Denji and Pochita's bodies.
Denji and Pochita cough blood.
A tentacle lifts the white haired yakuza.
Denji holds Pochita and runs. Zombies pursue.
Denji sees more zombies, and turns, stumbling between machinery.
The exit glows green ahead of him.
He pushes a metal box to the ground behind him.
A zombie trips over it. Others walk around or over.
He shuffles forward as a zombie gains on him.
The zombie strikes him across the back.
Zombies stab him in the back with chefs knives.
More zombies approach as Denji screams. Cut to black.
The moonlight shines on a dumpster. Denji's head, torso, and arms lie in pieces.
Blood runs down from Denji's mouth, over his lifeless eye, along coupons and newspapers, down Pochita's face and into his mouth. Pochita drinks the blood.
Pochita faintly opens his eyes.
In a flashback, Denji and Pochita chop wood in the forest.
Denji looks up at the sky
Blood runs down cables, which pull a hand to an arm. Another cable draws a foot to a leg. Pochita's face sticks out of Denji's chest, spreading throbbing, orange veins across his torso.
Denji opens his eyes.
Denji and Pochita sit in a glowing light
Denji sits up, alone in the dumpster
A black pull cord sticks out of his heart. It's Pochita's tail.
The zombies turn towards him. The Zombie Devil looks up. It is a giant, floating torso with an exposed brain, intestine tentacles, and a face emerging from the heart.
Denji steps out of the dumpster.
He remembers the yakuza, his debt, the shed, the cigarette, Pochita. He pulls the cord in his chest.
The zombies pile on top of him.
More zombies approach and climb on the pile
The Zombie Devil looks concerned.
Denji emerges in a wave of blood, slicing through the zombies with his chainsaw arms.
His head is motor of a chainsaw, which sticks out of his forehead. His eyes are glowing lights from the motor vents.
He leaps, exploding the zombies in waves of blood.
He drives a chainsaw into the Zombie Devil's face while laughing.
The devil bleeds from its eye. It grabs Denji by a tentacle and flings him across the warehouse.
He hits a beam, and drops to the floor.
He lands on the ground. A zombie approaches with a pipe and hits him in the metal head.
Denji looks back.
He chainsaws the zombie, then severs 2 more.
The Zombie Devil grabs 2 zombies with its tentacles, and tosses them at Denji. He pushes them away. More zombies fly towards him.
Denji runs towards the devil, slicing through zombies.
He slices an arm off, leaps, runs, steps over a zombie's face, and leaps into the air, arcing towards the Devil.
The Devil swipes at him with a tentacle. Denji chainsaws down the tentacle, leaving a trail of blood. The Devil watches in horror as Denji's shadow grows over its face.
The Devil screams as Denji slices it in half.
Blood rains from the 2 halves. Denji, splattered with blood, slows down and looks around.
He stands in a circle of blood and tentacles, surrounded by dozens of zombies
Denji cuts up zombies as they approach. Outside, dawn breaks over the mountains.
Mist rises from the trees.
Water drips from a leaky faucet onto a puddle.
A black sedan approaches the warehouse.
A woman walks towards the entrance. She has long, pink hair in a braid. She wears a suit and black trench coat. 2 men flank her, wearing hats and trench coats.
She stops in front of the bodies and blood spatter.
Her gold eyes look up. Chainsaw Denji stands in the shadows of the back wall.
The woman walks forward.
He starts to fall back. She hugs him, and he stops.
His chainsaw head melts off his human face.
She cradles his head
He looks up at her from her lap. Bloody, he turns to look at the zombie yakuza, lying in pools of blood.
He looks up at her, eyes wide.
She looks down at him, inscrutably.
The 2 sit in the center of blood and bodies. Cut to black.
Credits roll.
